name: responsive-image-generator
description: A plugin to extend AdobeÂ® Photoshop's Generate Image Assets feature
author: DanMad

scripts.bootstrap: rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && husky install && chmod +x .husky/*
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --noEmit && babel src/index.ts --out-file dist/responsive-image-generator.min.jsx --extensions ".ts" && uglifyjs dist/responsive-image-generator.min.jsx --compress --output dist/responsive-image-generator.min.jsx
